title: My Husband Won’t Let Me Out Of His Sight
itunes:title: My Husband Won’t Let Me Out Of His Sight
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my husband and I have been married for 8 years and during the pandemic, we did the opposite of gaining weight. We got serious about our health and lost a lot of weight. We spent our evenings walking around the neighborhood and he created a workout program for me, from stuff he found online. So, we are back to our pre-marriage weight. I am addicted to going to the gym and the squats have certainly paid off...................................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
